definition: to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: The customer cancels the order or makes order repeatedly.
sentences.chinese: 客戶取消寄件或重複下單。

sentences.english: If this value is above a certain threshold, you will automatically place an order for this stock.
sentences.chinese: 如果該值大於某個閾值，您將自動對此股票下單。

sentences.english: Once Client's instructions or Orders are given to Dandy, they cannot be revoked.
sentences.chinese: 丹迪一旦接受客戶指示或下單，他們不能被撤銷。

sentences.english: Before placing an order to buy a stock, check the asking price.
sentences.chinese: 下單買股票之前，先查一下賣價。

sentences.english: After ordering, please bank in within 3days , if not MM's order will be canceled.
sentences.chinese: 下單後，請在3天內匯款，否則MM的訂單將會取消。

sentences.english: Return service temporarily set up shop, so please be cautious orders.
sentences.chinese: 本店暫不設置退換貨服務，所以請謹慎下單。

sentences.english: And therefore the neckline is the best position to place your transactions.
sentences.chinese: 所以頸線位是下單的最佳位置。

sentences.english: You will receive a confirmation email (e-ticket) after your order was received.
sentences.chinese: 網上預訂下單被公司收到後，您將收到一份確認郵件。

sentences.english: TBP(Ticket-based Probing) algorithm is an effective unicast routing algorithm under imprecise network state information.
sentences.chinese: 算法是一種有效的非精確網絡狀態下單播路由算法。

sentences.english: But, these security concerns only apply to ordering keys in the post.
sentences.chinese: 不過，只有郵遞下單定製鑰匙，才存在這類安全隱患。

sentences.english: After the purchases, the rebate appeared instantly in my CashBack account.
sentences.chinese: 下單之後，所獲得的返利立刻出現在我的賬戶內。

sentences.english: The lead time between chip orders and delivery is two months or more.
sentences.chinese: 芯片自下單到交貨大約需要兩個月或者更長的時間。

sentences.english: Once Client's instructions or Orders are given to DFTT, they cannot be revoked.
sentences.chinese: DFTT一旦接受客戶指示或下單，他們不能被撤銷。

sentences.english: All orders must be paid in 2days after order placed.
sentences.chinese: 所有貨款需在下單的兩天後付款。

sentences.english: After placing delivery will revise, affect our production scheduling, and delivery.
sentences.chinese: 下單後會修改交期，影響我們生產的排程，以及出貨。

sentences.english: Now i am even more tense .
sentences.chinese: 嗚呼，現在比下單前更緊張了。

definition: to place an order/to book ahead
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結賬|结账
to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
